item.title: Microcosmum 2 - Soundtrack
item.description:
About This Content

Excellent meditative soundtracks, created by a talented composer specifically for Microcosmum 2.

item.title: Microcosmum 2
item.description:
About This Game





You are a collective microorganic alien intelligence.
You used to be the dominant species of a whole planet, but you had to leave your home since then.
Having spent many long years in space, you've finally landed on a habitable planet. You are to revive your "empire" and become small, yet great, once again.



A relaxing strategy game featuring unconventional gameplay. Your objectives include development, evolution, border expansion and protection of your hive.




Organism constructor:
Receive new details from defeated enemies and construct your own organisms. Every detail has a set of particular features, sometimes bestowing the organism with special abilities, such as slime bomb, spikes and much more.






World map:
The game takes place on a world map, split into locations. Everything is fully real-time. Opponents capture more land area, compete with each other, extract resources and develop said areas.

Environment:
All locations have particular environmental conditions. Organisms may freeze or overheat. They may mutate due to radiation and receive bonuses.
Acclimatize your organisms to certain environmental conditions in the incubator.
You are able to terraform your lands, creating extreme environments - beneficial to your organisms, yet deadly to your opponents.

Extract resources, erect "buildings", capture and defend land areas on the global map.

You can also feed your organisms, much like fish:)




Uniqueness and Project Concept:
Microcosmum 2 was conceived as a unique game, unlike any other strategy game, capable of surprising with new ideas. The emphasis is on creating a deep atmosphere, meditative gameplay, and a pleasant visual style. The goal is for the player to immerse themselves in the atmosphere and relax during the game.




Microcosmum 2 was created by a team of two people. For five years, we spared no effort, time, or resources in creating the game. For us, Microcosmum is not just a game; it's a unique world created by us with its own character and atmosphere.

Microcosmum: Survival of Cells was our first successful game. It became beloved by a large number of players and continues to be popular to this day. Therefore, in Microcosmum 2, we invested all our strength and accumulated experience to make it much better and bring joy to everyone who has been eagerly awaiting the second part, as well as to be a discovery for those who are just getting acquainted with Microcosmum.

Enjoy the game! :)

item.title: SEARCH ALL - SNAKES
item.description:
About This Game

SEARCH ALL - SNAKES

- This is a game in the “search for objects” genre, in which you need to find all the snakes in a large location. Snakes will be located in a variety of places, from the most visible to barely noticeable places. The entire game location looks animated due to the animation elements. Find all the snakes! Don't let them go unnoticed :)

Key features:
- Animation elements on the location;
- 100 snakes to find;
- Pleasant soundtrack;
- The gameplay can be interrupted at any time, and the game will automatically save the result;
- Hints implemented! If you have trouble finding an item, use the hint!

item.title: Rust Rails
item.description:
About This Game

RESOURCE COLLECTION AND CRAFT

On your journey, you will encounter various resources from which you can create weapons, armor, various items, or exchange them with a merchant.
Be careful, the space in your backpack is not endless, you will have to choose what to take with you and what to leave.

EVERY ADVENTURE WILL BE UNIQUE

The Roguelike system will make each race unique, a procedurally generated map, dungeons, train stations, loot will not let you get bored!

BATTLE SYSTEM

The weapons have unique mechanics - homing missiles, an energy ball, ballistic projectiles, and maybe ninja frogs...? Moreover, each projectile has its own type of damage - Normal, Energy, Frost, Fire, Poison. Weapons with different damage types pair well or poorly with active artifacts!

WORLD EXPLORATION

Random encounters with peaceful characters, secret rooms, riddles, dialogues will help you learn the history of this world.

item.title: Hunt Hide Run
item.description:
About This Game

There are two teams: Hunters and Runners.
Hunters have to find and kill all Runners before time runs out.

HUNT!
Hunters use blades that are very dangerous for Runners.


HIDE!
Runners can hide in different spots… even among fake bots!


RUN!
Run away from Hunters if they find you!


Match Settings
Host can change some match settings: characters’ velocity, round time, jump height, etc.

item.title: Ace Pilot Pacific
item.description:
About This Game

Ace Pilot Pacific

is my 3rd game and I have been working on it for around a year and a half. The action takes place during World War 2 in the Pacific.

You will fly one of the six different aircraft available against the Japanese.
You will be dog fighting against Zeros, Ki43, Ki49, G4M, G4M2, Hk8K2, Nakajima Kikka, J8M Shusui, and Shinden.

Choose between 5 missions:
- Atoll
- Pearl Harbor
- Wake Island
- Japan Run
- Ha Long Bay

You can play them in the order you want without restriction. The goal is to obtain the highest score in every mission. When you or one of your Allies destroys a plane, you gain a flag. When you have 3 flags, you gain an Ace level. The mission ends at Ace 100, if you are still alive. When you destroy an enemy, you get a Power UP, at Ace 100 you get an Upgrade.

All missions start with you and a wingman against 3 Japanese and when you gain an Ace Level, the number of enemies increase as well as the number of Allies, but the numbers are random, sometimes you get more Allies, sometimes it's the opposite.

Backgrounds are very detailed all in 4K HD. Atoll is a small map, Wake Island is a giant one 32768x30720 pixels. The effect is stunning and if you're like me, you will want to go swimming on that beach.

All the objects are 3D, even the sea.
I recommend you use a game controller. It's like flying a small RC aircraft on your screen. But it also works with a keyboard.

I am planning to add more missions if the reviews are good. If you like it, give it a thumbs up.
Hubert

item.title: Chrono Recorder
item.description:
About This Game

The player is trapped in an unknown space.
In the player's hands is a clock that controls time and a camera that controls the state of objects.
Clocks can stop or slow down time.
The camera can turn back time or change the gravity of an object.
The player must use these two objects to clear the stage.


This game was created by 4 developers.
There are not many stages in the game, so please enjoy it lightly.

(Maps may be added in the future. Good responses encourage developers.)

item.title: Bam Boom Blade 竹個擊破
item.description:
About This Game



Bam Boom Blade is a physics-based 2D joust game for 2 players. Players will act as a wuxia riding on a bamboo, and try to defeat your rival using only 2 joysticks on your gamepad.

SIMPLE AND INTUITIVE

Use left joystick to Bend bamboo, and use right joystick to Wave sword. It's just that easy. You and your friends can learn as soon as you hold your gamepad.

The control and mechanics are simple, but winning is not. Take full control of your body, sword, and manage the bamboo.

The Bamboo

Left Joystick is for Body and Bamboo. Push your joystick alongside the bamboo to climb up/down, or push towards other angles to bend the bamboo.

Build your momentum to one-hit kill. Climb down to the bottom and have a close combat. Intentionally get injured and free your leg to move wildly.

The Blade

Right Joystick is for Blade. When you hit, it makes a difference to hit different body part. Your Blade can parry rival's blade.

Parry rival's sword and do a counter attack. Attack your rival's flailing limbs with a precise slash! Or simply wait your rival to dash into your sword.

item.title: Akari and the Abyss
item.description:
About This Game


This game is a JRPG featuring a girl exploring the demon-infested Hell Palace.
During her journey, the demon-slaying girl, Akari, encounters incidents where people's souls have been stolen.
In order to save everyone, Akari challenges the Hell Palace and the story begins.


  • Female protagonist
  • Turn-based battles
  • Selectable difficulty levels
  • Auto-function available

item.title: Tank Tyranny
item.description:
About This Game

Gear up for an epic tank showdown in this dynamic local multiplayer game! Outwit friends in intense PvP battles or team up to defend against ruthless enemies in PvE!

You can count on each stage being different with procedurally generated levels, random item drops, and an arsenal of wacky powerups to give you an advantage in the competition!

Unlock tons of different decorations and hats to customize your character!

Grab up to 6 friends to play with - or against - to determine who is the ultimate champion!

Credit for trailer music: Fuzzeke

Features

  • Up to 6 player local multiplayer
  • VS game mode, for playing against your friends (2-6 players)
  • Survival game mode, for fighting off waves of enemies with your friends (1-6 players)
  • Arsenal of 7 different powerups to turn the tides of competition
  • 20 different unlockable decorations for the lobby
  • 8 different unlockable hats

item.title: Let Them Breathe: Hello Mother
item.description:
About This Game

Mrs. Chen, the mother of Jesse Chen, is asked to pick up some documents; these documents reside at the University of Tokyo where she used to work. Upon her picking up these documents, she engages with audio recordings and diary entries that tells her what exactly took place in the experimentation room.

Follow Mrs. Chen and discover more about the world of Let Them Breathe. In this walking simulation and collectable game, you will explore a small abandoned laboratory. Within the different compartments of the library, you will find items in which you will be able to engage with such as recordings, and documents in which you have to collect so as to win the game.

In this casual short game with a spice of thriller, the atmosphere allows for the player to walk the environment to discover what took place within various locations of the game. The player will find out more about the location, and the two individuals who once occupied the space prior to the player's arrival.

Let Them Breathe: Hello Mother is a video game that takes place within the Let Them Breathe franchise. It tells the story of Mrs. Chen who is the mother of one of the characters in the indie web series and even the indie movie, Let Them Breathe: City on the Ocean.

item.title: Suborbital
item.description:
About This Game

Many many years into the future, humanity has created and used warp drives. However, due to the recency of the technology, it still has many flaws. You are equipped with experimental engines and a warp drive, and you are tasked with finding the wreck of the EV Triumph, a large exploratory ship which lost contact on its journey through deep space. The reason was unknown, but you suffer the same fate.

Brace for a journey into the unknown. Explore a massive wreck and salvage materials to get out of your time-limited survival situation as quickly as possible. Every decision you make could mean the difference between life and death: Resourcefulness and strategy will be tested as you scavenge for supplies, and your ever decreasing oxygen levels keep you on your toes.

item.title: Rabbit Hole
item.description:
About This Game


“Remember you will live.”

Rabbit Hole is a fast paced, tough-as-nails 2D Platformer-RogueLike-Shooter inspired by popular roguelikes, made with a love for the genre.
You are Disc, someone who was suddenly brought to the Rabbit Hole.
Collect guns, fight foes and meet strange new characters on your descent to the bottom, all in an attempt to find your heart again.


“This place is like its own ecosystem. A big living breathing mess.”

Every run is different. Enjoy hours of replayable content through randomly generated floor layouts and 50+ weapons to collect and use.


“Hey, hey, hey! How's my favorite anxiety-fueled nutjob!”

Unlock new characters with diverse playstyles. Each of the 6 unlockable characters keep gameplay fresh and give a unique perspective on the gameplay loop.


“There was a blank line, almost as if I had erased it”

Discover the truth that lies beneath the surface. Collect books and fill out your library to understand its unseen history. In the end, you may even come to understand yourself?

item.title: Speed NFL
item.description:
About This Game

Play a football (American) game in 25 minutes. Select your team before using the NFL rankings to decide on your offensive tactics.

Key Features

NFL ranking
Betting odds
Play options - rush, Screen, Shotgun, bomb, side-line, end-zone, hail Mary, FG and punt
Time-outs
Flags
Scoreboard
Stats
Quarter by Quarter
OT
Team colours
Player names
Plaver v Player or Player v Computer

Game uses the ZX Spectrum interface.

item.title: The Secret of Varonis
item.description:
About This Game

Come join us on Discord! https://discord.gg/RKjYSATbTe

An indie Gameboy-style RPG!

The Secret of Varonis features old-school combat mechanics and visuals faithful to the gaming heyday of 1989. If you're nostalgic for retro games, or just looking for a good, challenging RPG, look no further.
  • Choose a party of humans, espers, robots, and monsters, each with a unique leveling scheme
  • Employ over 500 combat items and abilities, either learned, looted, bought, or crafted
  • Explore five unique worlds, each with their own story and characters, plus the sealed city of Varonis which unites them all...
  • Enjoy the best of oldschool mechanics without the pain points: no required grinding, optional field encounter mode, and other newschool ideas

What lies beyond the gate?

The city of Varonis once housed a wondrous portal. Wisemen and scientists emerged, bearing new technology and powerful artifacts. But when dangerous monsters also spilled out, the portal was sealed and the city abandoned. Jonas and Janine, two warrior twins, set out to discover what has become of the secret city, but when they fail to return, it is up to four village youths (and their trusty robot) to rescue them... and uncover the truth behind the gate of Varonis.

The four races

To challenge Varonis and the many trials beyond, you'll need to build your own party:
  • Humans - Sturdy generalists who buy potions to advance in stats. They carry swords, saws, shotguns, spellbooks... Versatility is key!
  • Espers - Natural-born fighters that learn from combat, granting stats, abilities, and powerful multitarget magic.
  • Robots - Customizable companions that can be built in many different ways. A tankbot made of armor? A ninjabot made of swords?
  • Monsters - Scrappy shapeshifters whose role in combat can change in a flash. Most monster abilities can be found nowhere else.

item.title: In a Detective's Mind
item.description:
About This Game

In a Detective's Mind is a short game made by two people, where you will play as Andrew, a detective who is learning to deal with the problems of his past. You will have to solve two cases, where you will receive very few details about what happened. The objective is for you to be able to put together in your head what happened in the place, with as little detail as possible, so it will be important that you explore and make deductions, so that you can solve the cases and puzzles in the game.

Build your destiny

Being a detective is not an easy task. With each new case you decide to investigate, new people have their fates sealed in your hands. One word, one wrong accusation can mean the end of an innocent life.

In a Detective's Mind proposes an experience where your decisions matter, changing not only the destiny of the people around you, but yours as well. Having 3 different endings, In a Detective's Mind takes you on a journey of no return.

item.title: MegaBlasters!
item.description:
About This Game



Get ready to laugh and blast through 100 physics-based maps in this comedic multiplayer FPS game. With wacky weapons and fast-paced action, it's a hilarious and explosive experience for you and your friends.



  • Play with 3 other blasters, either friends or random (all wrigglin' around)
  • Chaotic physics based guns
  • 100+ Chaotic physics maps (with destructive maps for destructive people)
  • Quick in-game chat (distract n' kill lol)
  • Who doesn't like blackholes and stuff?
  • Make someone go boom (sus bomb)
  • Noodle limbs (cuz why not)
  • Punch with your noodle hands
